rev.desc.rev.desc: If the config type is passed in ($dbl.config.type), then use that instead of finding the type using the function version(). Change was made on panel patch.config

pm11672 in startteam, could not export to text file. old line was exporting solely to puretext. now the line reads if ($L.mode="r") then (1 in $L.options="puretext") else (1 in $L.options="text"), to export in text, and import in puretext.
Implemented puretext as the 1st option in the options array for importing data so that it is not parsed.
Added parameter to support MVS PDS import.

descript.descript: If the config type is passed in ($dbl.config.type), then use that instead of finding the type using the function version(). Change was made on panel patch.config

pm11672 in startteam, could not export to text file. old line was exporting solely to puretext. now the line reads if ($L.mode="r") then (1 in $L.options="puretext") else (1 in $L.options="text"), to export in text, and import in puretext.
Implemented puretext as the 1st option in the options array for importing data so that it is not parsed.
Added parameter to support MVS PDS import.
